import_from_file.name: import_from_file
import_from_file.description: Imports long term statistic values (1h) from tsv/csv file

filename.name: filename
filename.description: The file containing the statistic data, to be put into the config folder

delimiter.name: delimiter
delimiter.description: The delimiter between fields. Default is empty (auto-detect is tried)

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.description: The decimal separator. Default is '.'; set to true to use ','

datetime_format.name: datetime_format
datetime_format.description: The format of the datetime strings. Default is '%d.%m.%Y %H:%M'. d .. day, m .. month, y .. Year, H .. hour, M .. minute

unit_from_entity.name: unit_from_entity
unit_from_entity.description: True: Take unit from existing entity (only valid for internal statistics, e.g. sensor.sun_solar_azimuth); False: Take unit from own column in imported data

export_statistics.name: export_statistics
export_statistics.description: Exports long term statistic values (1h) to a tsv/csv file

filename.name: filename
filename.description: The file to write the statistic data to, to be put into the config folder

entities.name: entities
entities.description: List of entity IDs or statistic IDs to export statistics for (supports both internal and external)

start_time.name: start_time
start_time.description: The start time for statistics export in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (must be a full hour)

end_time.name: end_time
end_time.description: The end time for statistics export in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (must be a full hour)

timezone_identifier.name: timezone_identifier
timezone_identifier.description: Timezone identifier for timestamp output formatting (check pytz timezones or https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones)

delimiter.name: delimiter
delimiter.description: The delimiter between fields. Default is tab; options are tab, semicolon, comma, or pipe

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.description: The decimal separator. Default is '.'; set to true to use ','

datetime_format.name: datetime_format
datetime_format.description: The format of the datetime strings in the exported file. Default is '%d.%m.%Y %H:%M'. d .. day, m .. month, y .. Year, H .. hour, M .. minute
